name: Shot Blocks
description:
-The #1 Most addictive Game of the Year-

How To Play:
-Tap To Shoot Blocks into the Empty Spaces
-Don't hit other Blocks that are already Filled
-Learn Patterns and improve hand eye coordination
-Earn Gold Coin to Unlock over 20 Characters
-Beat all 600 Levels to enter to Win Prizes

Become the best at Shot Blocks and enter to win many prizes. Follow us on Social Media for all our latest updates and Giveaways. This is the Latest game From Zoom Inc, Makers of Arrow Ambush and Snak Man. We thank you so much for playing, Enjoy!

Zoom
